overview: Siavash has a peaceful and simple life with his wife Shaghayegh and his daughter Tootia. Shaghayegh who is an architect, decides to become the CEO of a company which all the members are her female friends. Siavash who is writing his PhD dissertation in psychology, goes through some troubles with his wife because Shaghayegh has devoted most of her time to the company and pays no attention to him and Tootia ...
title: Tootia
